articles.title: Australian Dollar Looks Past Weak NAB Survey To Key Labor Data
articles.description: The Australian Dollar market is focused on this week’s official employment numbers, thanks to the RBA’s renewed emphasis on them. In the runup other data will struggle to move it.
articles.content:

And it has yet to encompass the current US-China trade standoff

articles.title: What changed for the market while you were sleeping? Top 10 things to know
articles.description: A list of important headlines from across news agencies that could help in your trade today.
articles.content:
Benchmark indices fell for the ninth consecutive session for the first time in eight years. Nifty broke 11,150 level while Senses ended below its 100-DMA.
